title: Donâ€™t like the AirPods Max Smart Case? Gucci has its own case for just $980
content:
AirPods Max were introduced in 2020 as the first wireless headphones under Apple’s brand, and while they offer great sound quality, some customers don’t like the controversial Smart Case. If you are one of them, you can now try a case made by the luxury Italian brand Gucci for just $980.

more…

The post Don’t like the AirPods Max Smart Case? Gucci has its own case for just $980 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: If you don't like Apple's Smart Case for AirPods Max, you can now try a case made by the luxury Italian brand Gucci for just $980.
